scripts.format-lint: npm run format; npm run lint
scripts.compile-common: cd ../common; npm install; npm run compile-tests; cd tests;
scripts.compile-gcn: cd ../gcn; npm install; npm run test-compile; cd tests;
scripts.compile-micronaut: cd ../micronaut; npm install; npm run test-compile; cd tests;
scripts.compile-micronautTools: cd ../micronaut-tools; npm install; npm run test-compile; cd tests;
scripts.compile-ociDevops: cd ../oci-devops; npm install; npm run test-compile; cd tests;
scripts.dependency-compile: npm run compile-common; npm run compile-gcn; npm run compile-micronaut; npm run compile-micronautTools; npm run compile-ociDevops
scripts.clean-resources: rm -r test-resources; rm -r .vscode-test; rm -r mochawesome-report; npm run clean-projects
scripts.pre-test: npm install; npm run dependency-compile; run clean; npm run clean-resources; npm run compile; npm run generate
